wishlist_emptyDescription: Start adding items you'd love to receive. Share your list with friends and family to make gift-giving easier.
item_editDescription: Update the details of your wishlist item.
item_addDescription: Add a new item to your wishlist.
item_quickAddDescription: Enter a product URL to quickly add an item to your wishlist.
groups_emptyDescription: Create groups to organize gift-giving with family and friends. Share your wishlist with specific groups.
groups_editDescription: Update the details of your group.
groups_createDescription: Create a new group to share wishlists with friends and family.
groups_leaveConfirm: Are you sure you want to leave this group?
invitations_inviteDescription: Send an invitation to join this group. They will receive an email with a link to accept.
roles_adminDescription: Admins can invite and remove members
shared_emptyDescription: When friends share their wishlists with your groups, their items will appear here.
shared_noItemsInGroupDescription: No one has shared items with {groupName} yet.
shared_noActiveClaimsDescription: Items you claim from friends will appear here.
validation_atLeastOneGroupRequired: At least one group ID is required
validation_fileMustBeImage: File must be JPEG, PNG, WebP, or GIF
errors_mustBeRecipient: You must be a recipient of this item to claim it
errors_itemAlreadyClaimed: This item has already been claimed
errors_partialClaimsRequirePrice: Partial claims are only allowed for items with a price
errors_itemFullyClaimed: This item has already been fully claimed
errors_claimExceedsRemaining: Claim amount exceeds remaining claimable amount
email_invitationSubject: {inviterName} invited you to join "{groupName}" on Giftlist
email_invitationBody: {inviterName} has invited you to join their group "{groupName}" on Giftlist.
email_invitationDescription: Giftlist makes it easy to share wishlists with friends and family, so everyone knows exactly what to get.
email_invitationLinkFallback: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link:
email_invitationFooter: You received this email because someone invited you to Giftlist. If you didn't expect this invitation, you can safely ignore this email.
email_claimExpiringSubject: Your claim on "{itemName}" is expiring soon
email_claimExpiringBody: Your claim will expire in {days} days. Please complete your purchase or release the claim.
landing_heroDescription: Create wishlists, join groups, and coordinate gift-giving without the awkward surprises.
landing_feature1Description: Add items with prices, links, and notes. Share them with specific groups.
landing_feature2Description: Create family or friend groups to share wishlists and coordinate gifts.
landing_feature3Description: Reserve items so others know what's being purchased. Avoid duplicate gifts.
landing_step1Description: Add items you want with prices, links, and notes. It takes seconds.
landing_step2Description: Organize with family, friends, or coworkers. Share your list with the right people.
landing_step3Description: Others claim items secretly. You get what you want without duplicate gifts.
landing_faq1Answer: Yes! GiftList is completely free. Create unlimited wishlists, join unlimited groups, and invite as many people as you want.
landing_faq2Question: Can the wishlist owner see who claimed their items?
landing_faq2Answer: No! Claims are completely hidden from the wishlist owner. Only other group members can see claims to avoid duplicates.
landing_faq3Question: What happens if someone else already claimed an item?
landing_faq3Answer: You'll see that it's been claimed and can choose a different item. For expensive items, you can contribute a partial amount.
landing_faq4Question: Can I share different items with different groups?
landing_faq4Answer: Absolutely! Each item can be shared with specific groups. Share work-appropriate gifts with coworkers and personal items with family.
landing_faq5Question: Do I need to create an account?
landing_faq5Answer: Yes, a free account is required to create wishlists and join groups. This keeps your lists secure and synced across devices.
landing_ctaDescription: Join thousands of families and friends who use GiftList to coordinate gift-giving.
share_iosMessage: iOS PWAs don't support web share targets yet. Open the app from your home screen and use Quick Add instead.
